title: Bloomberg Markets: Brilliant Says `Stick to Knitting'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Brilliant Says `Stick to Knitting'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jim Brilliant Portfolio Manager CM Advisors Discussing fixed-income investing and suggesting investors exercise discipline.
